籤詩版本二:
Cakudar kifi da dodanni suna da ma'ana iri ɗaya.Ku zauna a cikin zurfin tafkin ku jira sa'a.
Cikin rashin sani, Yumen ya tsallake rijiya da baya tare da daga kai.
詩意:
Kifin hexagram da dodo ba su canzawa.
Komai yana zuwa cikin lokaci.
解曰: Ko da yake Ziji ne. Hakanan jira. Shirya kasuwancin ku. Kar a yi gaggawa
籤詩故事一:
◇Hongwu kallon shanu
Zhu Yuanzhang, ɗan asalin Zhongli, Haozhou (yanzu lardin Fengyang, lardin Anhui), an haife shi a shekarar farko ta Tianli na Yuan Wenzong na daular Yuan, yana matsayi na huɗu a danginsa. An haife shi a gidan talakawa matalauta, saboda talauci tun yana karami, ya kasa yin karatu kuma ya taba kiwon shanu ga mai gida.
A cikin shekara ta huɗu ta Zhizheng (1344), an sami fari mai tsanani a birnin Huaibei, mahaifin Zhu Yuanzhang, mahaifiyarsa, da ɗan'uwansa sun mutu a jere, don haka ba shi da wani zaɓi sai ya zama novice sufa a Haikalin Huangjue.
Kasa da wata biyu da shiga cikin haikalin, saboda wahalar karbar hayar haikalin a cikin shekarun yunwa, mai haikalin ya rufe rumbun adana kayayyaki ya kori sufaye, Zhu Yuanzhang ya bar garinsu ya zama mai yawo (a. sufaye wanda ya yi rayuwa ta bara).
Daga baya, Zhu Yuanzhang ya zama Taizu na daular Ming da kuma "sarkin farar hula" a tarihin kasar Sin, mai suna "Hongwu".
(Ma'anar wannan labarin shi ne cewa zama na yau da kullun na ɗan lokaci ba yana nufin zai kasance haka nan gaba ba. Wannan saboda lokacin bai riga ya zo ba).
聖意: Iyali suna lafiya, iyali suna lafiya, arziki ya yi kyau, sana’a na jira, aure ya yi jinkiri, an haifi namiji a Liujia, mai tafiya a ƙasa ya yi latti, tsutsar alharini ta makara, tsutsar siliki ta wadata, dabbobi shida. an jera wutsiya, mutum ya bace, ba a jinkirta shari’a, hijira mai ra’ayin rikau ce, dukiyoyin da aka yi hasashe cutar ta hana su, kabari na dutse ne.
